OrgName: Total Comp Tools, Inc. dba NEXTCOMP.NET
activities: Hosting of compensation planning system for assigning pay increase recommendations, short-term incentive recommendations and long term incentive recommendations. TCT collects information for specific system implementations. The information may include an individual’s full name, corporate email address, hire date, and pay related data. TCT DOES NOT collect individually unique and identifiable information such as Social Security Number, national ID, phone numbers, or work or home addresses.
eucountries: Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Netherlands, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Client data: Employee ID, Job Title, First Name, Last Name, Corporate Email Address, Hire Date, Annual Base Salary, Annual Incentive Data, Long Term Incentive Data
recoursemech: Co-operating with the Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs)
